column1: So my family and I tried out clearasil maximum strength 5 in 1 spot treatment and we literally saw an improvement over night! It is quick simple and easy which is what everyone wants. No wires smell and it works quickly! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was my first time trying Clearasil, Stubborn acne control 5in1 One Minute Mask, and it works great. It doesn't dry out my face. I apply just a small amount and it goes a long way. It clear out my adult pimples. Also my teenage uses it and his face is starting to clear up as well. I will buy this product again and again for us. I recommend everyone to try it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Clearasil is a leader in skincare and Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control One Minute Mask is another great product to add to my routine. This minute mask leaves my skin soft, feeling clean and hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this stuff. I didn't have acne problems as a teen but ever since I have had kids I now have acne and nothing I have got before worked. This stuff has been amazing after a week using twice a day I seen a big difference. It smells good and leaves my skin so soft and smooth. I would rate 10 stars if I could! I highly recommend this! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5 in 1 exfoliating wash fights 5 stubborn acne problems. It fights blocked pores, fights pimple size, fights excess oil, acne marks and helps with blackheads. It contains salicylic acid acne medicine. It can be used 1-3 times daily to be most effective. I would recommend it to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Clearasil stubborn acne contr 5 in 1 spot treatment cream is a multi- benefit product that treats stubborn acne. My pimples quickly diminished in size overnight and I had less oily skin. The end result is clearer skin and better complexion that appears smoother overall. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This products works wonders I really enjoyed how easy to use it was and it actually works!!! Definitely would recommend it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Recently they discontinued Clearasil tinted with sulfur to the disappointment of many I'm sure! I had been using that product since I was a teenager and I can tell you that was quite some time ago! Nothing seems to compare so I gave this product 3 stars.

I was shocked when I opened this tinted acne medication. I don't know what the tint is supposed to do but it's WAY too orange to use as a cover up. Granted, the medication does help a great deal with my acne but I can't wear it around other people. It's a great price for the strength of the active ingredient.

This Clearasil Cream seems to work just fine at covering blemishes, etc., but it was a bit too dark in color for my skin tone, and as far as I know, this product is not available in different shades/colors, unfortunately.

I love this cream. I have been using it for years and it's the only thing that works to keep my chin, nose and forehead clear of breakouts. I also love that it's tinted, I use it in place of foundation under my makeup.
Tinted too dark, darker than the picture. The other Clearasil which was a lighter also worked better. Bring it back.
Changed label and ingredients but still love it. Needs to be in stock at stores though in this town.

Picture on order site is of ORIGINAL Formula which is what I thought I was ordering. Shipment received was of newer formula product which just does not work. I will be returning. That being said, shipping was fast as promised.
Can't find it in stores.
Great product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I put these on my daughters shoulder last night and when she woke up this morning you could tell the redness and swelling had completely gone down or subsided. I'm hoping that they continue to work even after we remove them. I wish I had something like this when I was her age! Glad so far that we bought them.

Clearasil needs to bring back the formula of Resorcinol 2% and Sulfur 8% and get rid of the 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, which not only dries out my skin but turns it red. Not to mention the color of the product is all wrong and is too orange. Or they should at least have both products available. Maybe I have sensitive skin but this product turns my face red and makes it itchy.
i wouldn't recommend this if you have dry sensitive skin. i used this product only for a few days and it dried out one pimple so much that there's a scab the size of a button on my face :(

I think that the Clearasil company changed their tinted color to match the growing population of darker skinned people. I ordered the tinted color because I have used it for years as a light foundation under my other makeup. WalMart and other stores have cut back in stocking the tinted clearasil, so I had to make a special order. I had always been happy with the natural beige tint, however, this last purchase the cream color is too dark and orange. It doesn't look like a tan...

Um these are amazing. 31 yrs old- never had cystic acne until now and it's SO EMBARRASSING. I bought these on Sunday for a zit on my chin that just would not go away. After just one night, the bump is completely gone and it's totally flat and dried out. Used one again last night and the red patch is now half the size. I'm honestly shocked!!! Highly recommend

I have acne that is caused by PCOS, a hormonal imbalance. This didn't seem to help the underlying issue. If seemed to help dry out pimples after they had been popped, but I didn't seem much help with I popped pimples. I haven't ever found a product that really worked for me, but this could possibly help others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was super excited to try this product. I have been looking for a face wash that would not leave my face feeling dry. This Clearasil didn't he trick. It's not dry, not only, but clean and fresh feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch 18 Count for my adult acne. Any time I feel a pimple coming up I put on on of these clear colored patches on. I put them on in the nighttime and in the morning I can see how much the patch has brought up. These help with quickening up the healing time. You could even wear these during the day for monster pimples! Since they are clear, they are barely noticeable. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was very excited to try my sample of Clearsil Stubborn Acne. I'm in my 40s and still have trouble with this! I also have two teen sons that have occassional problems . This worked really well for all of us. It took care of my acne and helped remove dry skin . I would definitely buy this again , it has worked much better than other products I've tried and a lot faster. It didn't cry out my face and it smell s nice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was a bit skeptical when trying these patches. I was nervous about creating areas of dry skin but it didn't happen at all. These patches are not only convenient and easy to use but also work effectively to clear acne spots without drying the skin. I'm definitely happy that I tried these patches. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I first thought that Clearasil Acne Mask was a face wash. Nope. I was wrong. The mask had a smooth texture. It went on very well. It did not take much to get complete coverage. It was surprised that the mask did not sting my face. I've had some do that before. It did not weight heavy on my face at all. It washed off very easily with warm water. My face was left feeling very soft and smooth. This is a must have. It's become part of my face washing routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This definitely helps speed along the process during a breakout. As a weekly product, I feel like it is a great way to clear out the pores and deep clean to help avoid having a major breakout. This was the first time I had heard of this product. I received it as a sample and will definitely be purchasing more. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have a very greasy face and with my line of work I sweat a lot which creates not just normal pimples, But those huge ones that people can't help but stare at when they're talking to you. I tried this product and it's magic. It did take me two nights of putting the patch on to completely get rid of it but after the first day it had went down a lot. I am always going to have these handy in my house. A thousand thumbs up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used the Clearasil stubborn acne 5 in 1 pimple patch and thought it worked great! I put it on before bed and the next day my pimple was almost completely gone and way less swollen! Perfect to use for the random acne breakout. They work well and quickly! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product worked ok. I only have been using it for two weeks. I haven't seen any results still breaking out and isn't really keeping it under control. Maybe I'll see results the longer I use it. I would reccomend as a face scrub to help your face feel fresh, but not for controlling acne. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My daughter and I have been using this scrub for a while now. It has definitely cleared up both of our faces. Especially her face. She uses it on a daily basis and it has totally cleared her up. The only problem is that it does dry out the face. If used roo often. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Im VERY impressed with Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch 18 Count ! My son has terrible acne and used it and the next morning PIMPLES GONE! VERY IMPRESSED! by far exceeded my expectations [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried these little patches for a week. Looking at the box they looked pretty uncomfortable and stiff and I thought I would have trouble sleeping with them, but I was very wrong. I forgot I was even wearing them as soon as I put them on. They worked to help my acne a little bit, but not something I would purchase again. I get those deep painful zits and didn't try them on other kinds of acne that they may work better for. Overall, I would recommend trying them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch were easy to use and effective. They worked better than products I have used in the past. The patches were easy to apply and worked really well. I had not tried this product or heard of it before. I would definitely recommend Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am facing some breakout and acne problem recently, and these came on the best time to try these. I put one of these on three nights in a row. The first night it reduced half the size, the second night made it much smaller. The 3rd night it was gone HOWEVER it left a red mark/scar. It took weeks to fade. It covered easily with concealer but still. I would put it on two times then wait a day between if you still need it. It pulls all the gunk right out though. It is amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the best cleanser exfoliating facial wash that I have used for my stubborn acne it suds up and leaves your face clean refreshed it really works on the acne mMy face drastically improved within the third day of use I would definitely recommend this to anybody battling stubborn acne [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this product twice a week. It's easy to apply and it smells amazing. It's helped me control my mild breakouts on my face. My face feels smooth, clean, and this mask does leave my skin feeling too dry. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Exfoliating Wash is a great face wash. This is the first product from Clearasil that I have used and really enjoyed it. The product is easy to use and lathered nicely on my face. It did feel a little oily at first, but once it was rinsed off, my face felt clean and smooth. The scent is pleasant and not overwhelming which is nice. My skin is clear and does not seem as oily as it usually is. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My teenage son used Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Exfoliating Wash. I see a huge difference. His acne has cleared up significantly. He applied the product once a day per instructions. The product was not extremely drying nor did it cause extreme peeling. It cleared up the acne and left his skin smooth. I highly recommend this product to others who suffer from stubborn acne. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My daughters tried this product and at first they were a little hesitant. They felt like the product was a little rough. However, after a couple of uses they saw a difference in there skin and they said that there skin felt "softer". Bottom line - my girls want me to continue to buy this all the time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used this product for a little over a week now and I've had great results thus far! It does not dry my face out and is helping clear up my break outs! I would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs to clear up their face! Great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was happy to be able to sample the Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control One Minute Mask. I really like the effects and I like the way the one-minute masks feel. An acne mask was a brand new concept to me and it's amazing to me how it can do the job in just one minute but it sure does. I recommend this product to anyone with acne or who has children with acne. I trust the Clearasil brand and this is a Clearasil product I think they should continue to sell for a long long time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This facial cleanser is very effective! The exfoliating beads work well to get rid of dead skin cells. After washing my face, it feels clean and refreshed. It doesnt smell like chemicals, nor does it have a fake floral scent. It smells very clean and fresh. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My Son is teenaged and going through a particularly rough patch of acne. It's very stubborn! He exercises good hygiene and isn't a popper or picker! I've noticed a breakout on his chin and jaw line. We used 4 of the Clearasil patches and he slept overnight with them in. 3 out of 4 blemishes came to a head and opened. 1 did not. The 1 that did not was a little angry and drier. I felt like 75% was a pretty good success rate! We will definitely use these again in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Excellent product! Easy on the skin and helps reduce acne quickly. My daughter has acne , and after trying multiple products,I've decided to try this one . It works wonderful, we can see a reduction in her acne , her skin is glowing, and soft . I am very impressed , and will continue buying this amazing product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product, I am 29 years old and since adolescence I suffer from acne, I have tried food but nothing, my skin is very greasy, and I still have outbreaks. But this product makes my skin almost perfect, you can feel the difference at the moment of using it, zero fat and you can see how the grains disappear with their use, easy to use and a pleasant smell 100% recommended [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

These dots helped the pimples on my face clear up faster. I put them on very night for a week and also wore them under makeup. And my pimples seemed to be less red, less inflamed and healed faster. There isn't any acne medication in these but there is something that helps your skin clear up faster, might be shielding the skin from the elements. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My Grandson has been using Clearasil for stubburn acne for the past 5 days. He has been having better results than he did with the Proactive set I bought him last year and paid a lot more money for. we hipe for conti ued results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this product on a blemish that showed up earlier this week. I used a patch for the past two nights to see if it would help and I definitely noticed a difference after the two days, the blemish wasn't as noticeable or red. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5 in 1 Exfoliating Wash is the best face wash I have used. It has cleared up my face within one week. No face wash has ever done that. It doesn't dry out my face like other exfoliating washes do, either. I only need to use it once a day to keep my acne and blackheads under control. It's great! I will be using this from now on. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great quality product that actually works. I received this product free to review so not sure of the price but it's quality is right by up with high dollar products. I seen a big difference after using. My forehead had so many pimples but was noticeable less the next morning. I highly recommend this to anyone that has stubborn acne. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch was no match for my bad pimple skin and this was the first time I have tried using Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch and my pores seen to have gotten worst after I usingClearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Pimple Patch and I will not use it again [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just love clearasil products. I used to use it when I was a teen and now my teenager is using it! It is really helping to treat her pimples. She really has enjoyed this product and it is helping her skin tremendously. I will repurchase this when she is done. I highly recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love this quick mask! I have stubborn acne as an adult on my nose. It drives me absolutely crazy. This mask dries out the pimples to help speed up healing. Normally my friends are around for a week or so, but this helps cut that time in half. I was impressed after my first two uses! Definitely going to be my go to anytime I have a breakout! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was not aware of Clearasil Overnight Spot Patches before being chosen to try them. I definitely would recommend them to others. They are great and really work to get rid of pimples in a clean way. Keeping bacteria out is important. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've never had a face wash work so well! My skin looks a lot brighter than usual, my pores shrunk, and the stubborn red bumps along my hairline have disappeared! I use it twice daily with Shea butter as a moisturizer after and my skin is very healthy. I got this as a free sample and will be buying it from now on :) If you have dry skin I wouldn't recommend it more than once a week, but I have oily skin and it works wonderfully. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

These are so sheer you can basically wear them during the day even though they're supposed to be at night. And just one night the size of my incoming pimples went down as well as the redness. Definitely a must have product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The clearasil stubborn acne control I feel works fairly well. I used it for a Whitehead and it removed the head. The aftermath is the surrounding dried skin. I really think this would be more effective after 2 applications. I would recommend this to someone with occasional outbreaks. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I always knew the Clearasil brand was great and now my daughters have seen how great it is. The rave about how their faces feel so clean and smooth. I have noticed a reduction on their acne and it seems to be helping them a lot. They use the cleanser twice a day and they have now asked me to make sure they always have this product in their medicine chests. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I can't rave enough about this product. I was very skeptical at first as I am what most acne products but this really did blow my mind. it's very easy to apply and use I didn't realize that the product was on my face. I used it on a variety of sizes of pimples has it got rid of most of them which is incredible. No weird tingling or burning sensations. I will continue to buy and use this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I would definitely recommend Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control Exfoliating Wash! I've had stubborn adult breakouts for years and it's so hard to get them under control. I noticed a huge difference within the first few days of using this face wash. My breakouts are finally so much better and 85% cleared up! I will definitely keep using this product as it doesn't leave my skin feeling dry or burning. Thanks Clearasil! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Use morning and night for best results! My skin cleared up within 4 days after start of the stubborn acne wash. I've always had acne issues and used clearasil in the past so I was a little worried it wouldn't work like before. But I was wrong! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My daughter is absolutely in love with this! She uses it daily even when her acne clears. I can see a great difference in her skin. Much clearer and acne disappears in a few days. Gonna have to keep buying. Great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am very surprised by this tiny product. I have never tried anything else like it. It was so tiny and thin but really did a good job at covering up the blemish. It reduces the redness and blends right in with the skin. It feels like nothing is on. And is not drying at all. I think I will buy this again when we need it and tell my friends about it too. I have seen products like this in other brands but did not know Clearasil made them. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product does exactly what it says. I am very shocked at how well it works. I am to old to get acne yet I still do and it is embarrassing. This helps shrink and clear up any pimple that pops up out of no where. These are a must have for any one that breaks out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control One Minute Mask 6.78 oz for the first time. I love it, it's the best Acne Control, compared to other brands, and that's why I recommend it and I would love to buy it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control 5in1 Spot Treatment Cream through viewpoints. I was glad to receive a full size sample as this gave me time to try it out. It worked great! It cleared up stubborn acne within 2 days and the redness disappeared immediately. It didn't dry out my skin either like other products I have used. I would definitely purchase this and recommend it to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this product for a week in exchange for my opinion. It is definitely heavy on the exfoliating! I wonder if it was a perhaps a bit harsh for my skin. I don't have sensitive skin, but it felt really abrasive. I didn't get any new breakouts, so that was a positive. I miss the brightening aspect of my regular face wash. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this for my teenage daughter who has been having issues with acne and stressing out about it. This mask is nice and simple and makes your face feel clean and refreshed. Great product you can't go wrong with clearasil! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had not used clearasil since i was a teenager but I decided to give it a try again in my 30s with a recent flare up. I now remember why teenagers swear by it. I tend to have dry skin but my skin held up just fine with this product. The microbeads provide a good scrub and my face is soft and clean feeling afterwards. It's also easy to rinse off. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the soothing effect of this one minute mask. It is super fast and takes no time at all. It leaves your face feeling refreshed and looking vibrant. My pores were clean and had no breakouts since using. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After trying many different product on the market it looks like we finally have a winner here. My face feels clean and clear and even my 17 yo son is getting the results he was looking for. His face is starting to clear up, brighten up and look healthy without any redness or irritation. Looks like a home run in our house with Clearasil 5 in 1! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was super surprised when I tried these. I was expecting maybe after a few days I would see my acne disappear but I was shocked when I woke up and my problem areas had been literally erased. Super easy to use and clean up is a breeze! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this mask/face wash for around a year now. Thus far, it's been the only acne product to actually clear my face-not just for a short period, but for as long as I use it. In fact, when I stopped using it for a short time, my acne came back; when I started using it again, they went away. Overall, I 100% recommend. Bear in mind that all products work differently for everyone, so it may not work for you. Nevertheless, it wouldn't hurt to give it a try.

This product is very easy to use and very quick to dry down & do its work - it is perfect for busy people or people who just want a quick and effective solution. It has a bit of a smell but not bad though. There is sometimes a bit of a tingling feeling as it does its magic. Would highly recommend to anyone! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My son who is 14 has had acne for about 6 months now. He has been using the Clearsail Stubborn Acne Control for 2 weeks and we have seen a huge improvement with his skin! It really helped clear it up. Its nice to notice his eyes and smile instead of his acne again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Clearasil Stubborn Acne Control One Minute Mask was a master mask! The recent ones I have bought for my son (which I tried) did not prove too effective and ended up getting returned or thrown out. This worked like magic clearing his skin - and that stubborn acne. I have already bought another one for his trip coming up and recommended it to other moms. Great to have been able to try it as I had seen it but never ended up getting it. You won't be disappointed! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This acne treatment really is working. I usually don't fall for these "fast working" products, but why not? I was desperate! WOW I saw results in just a day and day two was crazy! My acne wasn't red anymore. I had a zit underneath my skin and it reduced in size and pain. I'm shook!! I love this product. It seems I'll go back for other products in the line.

I have Adult Acne & Clearasil tinted help me cover my blemishes when I have a break out. In addition, I use it as a base for my tinted moisturizer, because I dislike the feel of make-up on my face & the tinted Clearasil helps.

I've used it a couple times and each time it's made my face break out more than it already was. Thank goodness it works for my step daughter so it isn't a complete waste. Smells pretty good [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My son used these and he said he liked them. He said they were easy to use and seemed to work pretty good. He said there's no smell to them and very easy to apply. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

No acne medicine is a miracle. However these do lighten up the area overnight! Better than expected and these work better than other remedies I've tried previously! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I saw no good difference using these patches. Just left a ring around the already existing pimple. ‍♀️ I definitely wouldn't recommend these. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
For a long time I have been using the same face wash. I tried this one and I love it. Leaves my face feeling fresh and clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I let my teenage daughter that suffers from acne use this product. She said that it had a weird texture and was difficult to wash off. She had to scrub it off which caused irritation on her skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used these pimple patches more than a couple times a week on some serious boils that cropped up. They either cleared up the zit completely or brought it to a head so i could rid it out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this at night in the shower and my face feels so clean and fresh!! I love how my skin feels like it's breathing!! It opens my pores and cleans all the makeup and dirt from the day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My teenager really likes this face wash! She has very sensitive skin but this wash worked great for her. This makes her skin very smooth feeling. We were very pleasantly pleased with this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love using this makes my face feel so soft and clean. Doesn't seem to dry out my skin so far. Will be having my teen daughter try it next. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like how they actually reduced my acne with out burning my skin or leaving any red irritating marks on my face [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My daughter has been using this face wash for a few weeks now and we can really tell a difference. Her skin is much clearer and she likes the way her skin feels. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this exfoliating wash. It works great , exactly what i needed. It keeps my skin clear and clean! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is quick to clear up red spots and blemishes. It does irritate or dry out my skin. Easy to use and quick to put in my daily routine of face care. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I put the cream in my hand then rubbed the together and spread it equally on my face it smells AMAZING i love this one minute mask .My new favorite for sure.Easy to use. And works great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really like the clearsil, especially the smell and the clean feeling it gives.. just make sure you thoroughly wash all of the scrub off.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great product, it reduced pimple size and took away redness. Only complaint is keeping it on all night, if you are a rough sleeper the covering may fall off. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used This on a few pimples I had That wouldn't go away. It worked amazing. I could Notice a Difference the next day and after that they went away. My new go to acne treatment [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Really wanted to love these, however they seem to dry my face out too much. Nevertheless, it worked in removing the pimple overnight as stated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My face is very "angry" right now so I think this sample came at the perfect time. It worked on most of my acne. Some of the stubborn ones took a while. I would buy this again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have been using this product for a week now and it has really helped reduce the size and heal time of the acne [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My thirteen year old use the Clearisil Acne Mask,and unfortunately she had more breakouts after using it. It made her skin feel tight and dry. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I got this for my daughter and it really works. Her blemishes were significantly smaller in less time than usual. I recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have always had acne and nothing ever seems to work. Clearasil Slot Treatment Cream helped to get rid of it. My face is much more clear and my skin is healthy! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It was very easy to use and when I removed it in the morning my blemish looks smaller and less angry [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like this product so far. It smells good and makes my face feel fresh. I haven't noticed a big difference yet but I do enjoy using t! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like that it doesn't have a harsh smell... It kinda makes your face very dry and skin peel. So i didnt continue use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used a Clearasil Pimple Patch on a stubborn pimple on my chin that was there for about a week. After 2 days of using this Patch, the pimple was gone! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I put a patch on when he first noticed a spot starting and used it according to package directions and it was amazing. I would buy it again [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
